body:
Attending the tutorial at the SC17, I had to create a dockerfile for it.

With this one can play around with spack on a (non-Linux) Laptop. Thus nice for tutorial.
But also nice to create the same output. The resulting install-directory could be extracted and put everywhere.

Furthermore, by using multi-step builds it could be introduced to other Docker images.
And that's just scratching the surface.
title: initial version of Dockerfile and README
